content.detailedDescription:
I had spent about 10 minutes on my front step taking photos.  once i looked at the photos on my computer, i noticed 3 of them had objects in the sky.  i have already reported one.  this is the second.
i didn't see it, or hear anything.  it only showed up in one frame and i had set my camera on continuous shots at 2 shots per second.
i had my camera set at 2 1/2 times zoom (15 to 18mm). canon g11
content.summary: Disc shaped grey object in sky

content.detailedDescription: Saturday july 12, 2014, 4:10 am.  i saw a typical bright white flying u.F.O. to the southeast flying with an unwavering light to the north.  i ran inside and quickly got my strobe flashlight and my 532nm 200mw green laser.  only a few seconds later back outside i saw that it was no longer visible and i was so disappointed that i missed it.  but, as i searched the sky i saw it again following it's original trajectory to the north, now directly in front of me as i faced east.  it no longer had it's bright white exterior light but i could see it's dull gray mass (in the light of the full moon the sky was pretty well lit) accompanied by a dull reddish glow moving across the sky.  the i lost it but a couple of minutes later it appeared again as a bright white light flying again from the southeast to the north.  this time i tagged it with my laser.  by the way this laser is a class 3b laser and the green beam is solidly visible in the sky for a few miles.  i read about a guy in england who used a green laser and got a u.F.O to repeatedly flash back at him and i later achieved this.  i placed the laser beam on the u.F.O. as it flew to my left for about 5 seconds then it turned off the light.  my adrenaline was racing and my knees were shaking as i waited for the next game.  as i waited i used my strobe light and my laser to try to attract them again. then a few minutes later the light appeared again moving from in front of me in the east to the south.  i again used my laser on it and it turned it's light off but as it flew i could clearly see it's dull gray maybe oval shape emitting a constant dull reddish glow.  i then thought of another game.  instead of hitting the ship with my laser i shone the laser solid beam in front of where i saw the ship heading so that the ship's operators could see my laser beam crossing in front of their path.  this way i would not blind them.  they again signaled me with the white exterior light.  by the way this light was close to the brightness of venus.  i repeated this game about three times and each time getting exterior light responses as the craft continued to fly to the south.  my knees were still shaking and i thanked them for paying attention to my sky watching (every night) as i saw the dull gray ship with a very dull reddish glow fly to the south over the hills northeast of mt. diablo.  i thought it was over and i waved goodbye and the ship gave me a goodbye with one more immediate pulse of white light.  definitely the best i've seen yet!  the whole viewing was about 20 minutes.  i estimate that the ship was less than a mile away and about 15 foot long.  i assume that it was a typical flying saucer with 2-3 operators.  i'm sure that there were people on board, not like those orange orbs i saw which i think are drones.  by the way i'm sure by now the pilots of these ships know me and are also curious about me.  i'm sure they've got my number.  i believe this is the same ship and pilot that displayed the pulses of light that i observed on june 28, 2014.  we got a game going.  wait until they see my 635-638nm red-orange 500mw laser!  (it's still in the mail.)
content.summary: Starlike flying u.F.O. intermittently displaying exterior lights several times and changing course while still visible with the light off.

content.detailedDescription:
I don't know if this is a plane or something else but after much research online, i have not found any planes, jets or whatever with exhausts the size of these on the flying object.
i was in sw calgary sitting on my front step taking photos with my camera.  it was set on continuous shots at 2 frames a second.  in one frame nothing, next frame the object and then the 3rd frame nothing.  estimated speed at 2500 to 3600 mph.  that's a guess.
there was absolutely no sound.  zero sound.  i didn't see it.  my camera picked it up.
it was shaped kind of like a b2 bomber but the exhausts on the back are absolutely massive!! the color was a dark dark grey color.
it was taken at 3:33 pm mountain time in canada.
content.summary: Shaped like it was mostly wings with massive exhausts shaped similar to a b2 bomber

content.detailedDescription: I walk my dog every morning before work, 6:40 am as i walk towards my front door when i grabbed the door handle a reflection caught the side of my eye, i turn and observed a metallic saucer my first reaction was ok where is the string hold the object up is this a toy and it took a moment for me to realize what i was looking at was reel i was frozen how can this be no markings, no lights, no windows the metal was very strange and the way the metal was seemed together, i got a good look at this saucer, the amazing thing was the way it hovered. it did not move side to side or up or down i just kept saying how can this be. keep in mind that this is in the flight zone for pbi, mia,fli international airports, someone else had to observed this air craft. i live  on the east coast line of florida. i was scared to come forward with my event. it is hard to get out of my head, as for as i am concern this was not from this world this object was not man made. i think we have neighbors i felt that this object knew i was observing it i know that sounds crazy. i also want to add that i have been a building contractor for 25 years i am good with measurements, angles, and degrees.
content.summary: Observed a metallic suacer 60 feet across 12 height, no windows, no lights, no marking

content.detailedDescription:
At the begining of july, 2014 i was on trip to london with my mother and brother. when we went back home and checked our videos and pictures taken during that trip we noticed some strange silver orbs. first silver orb was over the swiss re building (picture taken on 3rd of july, 2014, about 10:30 am, local time). second one was next to our plane shortly after departure from heathrow airport (picture and video taken on 7th of july, 2014, about 11:00 am, local time). during the flight crew member informed us that we were 10 000 meters over ground and we were moving 787 km/hour. the orb on video is much faster.
video and pictures are made with camera phone nokia asha 303.
plane is boeing 737.
content.summary: Unidentified object over swiss re in london

content.detailedDescription: Objeto parecido a un disco oscuro aparece sobre area rural donde se ubica una feria
content.summary: Objeto parecido a un disco oscuro aparece sobre area rural donde se ubica una feria

content.detailedDescription:
My boss and friend, a very credible business man, called me on 7-11-2014 around 10pm. he had just left the shop and was leaving the industrial park approaching a red light when he notices what he said looked like a ball of fire.

before i continue with his description, i would first like to say that he is a very reserved, logical and practical man. he is very familiar with aircrafts and aviation through his hobbies. he has little to no time for interest in things outside of normal reality like this. and thus, when he called me, was hesitant to describe this until i think i broke the ice with the word "ufo" and then i heard that comfort in his voice as if it was assuring him i would not think him crazy for what he was about to tell me.

so he's approaching the red light when he notices this fireball in the sky. at first he thought it was a star by initial glance but immediately realized it was moving at an incredible rate when it then slowed down very quickly to a point of "almost" hovering (i believe he really wanted to say it stopped and hovered but wanted to hold some level of reservation even in his awe). this is when he noticed that it had what he called a "sparkler effect" almost as if the same look as sparklers you see people waving on the 4th of july and such, coming from what he assumed was the back end based on its direction.

he had with him a good digital camera and snapped this photo. the bright light on the left is a street light - the small cigar shaped orange object in the center is the ufo. he says he pulled over and got the camera rather quickly, however, he is not very familiar with the hardware and originally intended on taking video footage, but in haste and fear of losing a shot entirely, took this photo as is without zooming or anything.

so he pulled the car over and took this photo. he says he believes in the time that he grabbed the camera it began moving in a new direction again and thinks it looks cylindrical like that because it was in motion. right after taking the photo, he looked down at the camera to make sure a picture had actually taken and when he looked back up a second later it was gone. he doesn't know if it disappeared or flew away, but it happened so fast that that aspect alone amazed him as much as the sighting in the first place.

judging by the picture, its saturation level is very bizarre - and it almost looks more like an illuminated object with a hard surface of little reflectivity rather than a light object or a highly reflective surface. he described it as spherical and a light source like fire. very odd in comparison to the photo. could this be a morphing ufo? i would assume that the streaking of an object in motion would have a faded tail, but i can't tell which direction it's going or if it even is moving.

it's a perplexing photo to me really, and i'm sure it's 100% legit. just taking a photo and getting it to me in an email is the extent of his technological capabilities concerning tampering with a photo, not to mention his trustworthiness.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Fireball, high speeds, abrupt stops, hovering, directional change, instantaneous dissappearance

content.detailedDescription: My best friend and i were atop my shed watching the lighting storm when i looked over and saw this strange object at first i thought it was an airplane then i relized that there was a lighting storm. and i didnt think an airplane would be flying in a storm like this. the object was flying in a strait line across the sky, it was hard to see its shape. my friend and i were amazed at this though we werent fully convinced it was extraterrestrial until i remembered the storm, there was blinding flashes of lighting but no thunder -strange-if you ask me. after watching the object for a couple minutes we went inside to share our story with our parents.
content.summary: My best friend and i were on the roof of my shed and witnessed object.

content.detailedDescription:
I originally posted this sighting to alt.Ufo in 1995. below is the original posting without the crude ascii drawing. i attached a better sketch to this posting.


in the summer of 1974, i saw a pair of triangular objects while stargazing with binoculars. at the time, i assumed that they must have been aircraft. but it's been a long time since then, and i haven't ever seen any airplanes, or whatever, that even remotely resemble the objects i saw. i have just recently gained access to the web, and being amused by ufo stories, i found my way to a couple of the ufo pages. while browsing at rutgers, i ran across some reports of "triangular ufo's", which made my hair stand on end. up to that time, i had not heard of "triangular" ufo's. here's what i saw in late august, 1974 while i was in the back yard of my house in campbell, ca (south sf bay area). 

i was laying on the ground, looking through a pair of 20 power binoculars. my feet were pointed east, and the binoculars were pointed slightly to the right of straight up, at about the one o'clock position. something went through my field of vision, moving right to left. i caught up to it quickly, and saw two objects flying in close formation, one behind and to the right of the one in front.They were both the same size, shaped like equilateral triangles with straight edges, flying point forward. their color appeared to be flat slate grey, against a deep black sky. there were no features, and i saw no lights, or glow of any kind. they appeared to be illuminated by the city lights. it looked something like this: 

(original ascii drawing removed. please see enclosed drawing. it depicts the two ufos travelling due north, which is towards the left edge of the drawing. the stars in the background appears as streaks because i was panning the binoculars to the left) 

there was something very peculiar about the way they looked as they flew. the craft in front appeared more steady than the trailing one, and the distance between them fluctuated randomly, varying from nearly touching, to a maximum of a triangle length. when the rear one began to lag, it would suddenly snap back to a comfortable distance from the front one. my impression was that it looked as though they were being manually controlled by pilots, and as if they had very high power to weight ratio, and like they were somewhat hard to control. i watched them for about 8 to 12 seconds. during that time, they maintained a due north heading, and covered about 80 to 90 degrees of azimuth. after i lost sight of them, i waited for several minutes for any sound. i heard nothing. the binoculars were 20x50, with a field of view of 157 feet at 1000 yards. if you assume that the objects were about 100 feet long, and took up about 1/3 of the field of view, then their altitude would be 2000 yards, or 6000 feet, and their speed would be 568 mph. that seems pretty conventional, but i think i would have heard jets at that altitude. furthermore, what jets have a perfect equilateral silhouette? the closest thing i can think of (that would be flying in 1974), is the b58 hustler. but my view was clear enough, that i could have seen the little bit of fuselage in the front and back of the delta wing. i probably blew the simple geometry i used for the altitude and speed calculations, but i've given enough facts that one could calculate height and speed for any craft of a given size.
content.summary: Black triangles observed over campbell ca

content.detailedDescription: Red pulsating light no sound from south east watched it traveling towards our  direction my brother ran inside the house to get binoculars he came out and was trying to sight and focus on the object it stopped for a few seconds then started to rise slowly at first then shot up and disappeared you could see the trails, few seconds it was out of site im ex airforce never saw anything like it
content.summary: Red pulsating light no sound

content.detailedDescription: On july 11th,2014,at approximately 2130,while attending no alcohol birthday cookout in newnan, georgia, observed bright white object at high altitude traveling from south to north.Object flared brilliantly then rapidly dimmed to dull,reddish orange color. object then made abrupt u-turn and took a southerly track.Object was lost in glow of full moon.Object's speed was about one-third that of jet aircraft. object was under observation for nearly 15 minutes and covered several degrees of arc.
content.summary: Bright white object traveling at slow speed and high altitude flared brilliantly then rapidly dimmed to dull reddish orange.Object made abrupt u-turn. object traveled at about one-third the speed of jet aircraft.

content.detailedDescription: I was awake on facebook typing and i saw a car slowly driving on my street nothing special then out of nowhere it morphed into a ufo like a transformer does and took off it was so powerful my raido shut off my lights malfunctioned and it knocked me on the floor.I am a man who is deeply connected to this kimd of thing but it was something new to me entirely.Aliens are posing as human vehicles and watching humans on the road.
content.summary: Car turned into ufo

content.detailedDescription:
I was returning home from a party, time bout 4 am, a bright, white disc, appeared to be a flying saucer, traveling about 1,000 mph, in straight line, due south; ascended over mountain; then descended out of view. the fact that i had been drinking at the party, i had to 'rub my eyes' to make sure.  however, i had seen a white lighted disc, for sure, before. and this was the same type craft.
probably twice the size, moving slower, following the contour of the ground; then ascended over a mountain; could see it descending, until out of view.
content.summary: Bright, white disc, following contour of ground, ascended above mountain, then descended out of sight.

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were walking home from dinner. i'm a scientist and a keen yet amateur astronomist, so i regularly look up into the sky to see what planets and constellations i can see. we ate at pizza buona on sunset and were walking on sunset blvd heading east, back to our house when  on the corner of sunset and park i looked up at the almost full moon and noticed a red pulsating light in the sky. i told my boyfriend, he looked, we speculated, hmmm looks like the color of mars but i said it's oval or star shaped like saturn yet it's the size of jupiter. the light we saw was just left of the moon, and we were walking east, the moon was to the southeast of us so the ufo was southeast of us as well but just north of the moon. i have a sky viewer app so i pulled out my phone to see what planet it was���.Here's where it got weird: we both noticed the "planet" was moving slowly, i personally couldn't say it was moving quickly or in any particular direction but there appeared to be motion. it got smaller, like the star shape went away, it went from being oval/star shaped and pulsating to being really small, still red still pulsating and then it was just gone. by then i had gotten my phone out, opened sky viewer and it didn't show that there were any stars, planets, or satellites anywhere near the red light. i did notice, however, that there were 2 distinct contrails in a v formation north and south of the moon and the unidentified object, they literally looked like a right side up v on either side of the moon and where the light was. i have zero idea if this part means anything, but as a scientist, particularly a biologist, i understand detailed observations, are critical. i didn't at any time see a plane or a helicopter, just the contrails but shortly thereafter i did see a plane and a helicopter but not as high up or in the same place. which is not unusual, there's a few airports kind of nearby and a our neighborhood is on a helicopter route. it bears emphasizing that i know what a plane looks like in flight, and a helicopter, in the day, at night, when it's cloudy, dark, bright, low, high up, ect. and this was not a plane or a helicopter. for sure. it was up high, equal to wherever the moon was in los angeles at about 11:30-ish on july 11th. i honestly thought it was a planet for 90% of the time it was visible, from the size, the color, the pulsation, the angle, then it suddenly moved and or shrank either in a quick succession or simultaneously. i was shocked, but my boyfriend agreed that it happened pretty much exactly as i've stated. sorry i don't have any additional info or details, it was a weird occurrence and i'd love a rational explanation.
content.summary: Light color of mars shape of saturn size of jupiter next to moon between 2 contrails hovered got smaller and dissapeared

content.detailedDescription: We were sitting outside smoking a cigarret when my son noticed the first firey sphere, we went to the front yard and observed it moving from the southeast to the north, flying through the sky. at first i thought it was a plane on fire but it continued on its path. then about 2 minutes later another firey ball came from the same direction and same flight path. then about one minute later another one flying lower, just a couple of hundred feet above the ground flew by in the same direction then sped up. we were both shocked by what we saw and do not know what it was. the object continued to the north and faded in the distance,
content.summary: Three spheres of fire that flew from the southeast to the north

content.detailedDescription: From around the 69-illinois roads exit looking south there were multiple red/orange lights, looking to be as far south as the yoder area. the lights were in formation and headed east towards the ohio border. there was a lot of cloud cover so they eventually moved out of visibility. i decided to drive after them and later found that the airport had out aircraft bright blinking red lights around where the lights were initially seen, these were definitely distinctly different than the original ufo's.
content.summary: Red lights above fort wayne

content.detailedDescription: Was on phone at home on cell talking to my mom. sitting on front porch i saw a light in sky that was emerald green it ws off in distance in between 2radio towers.I witnessed it hover then move left to right then drop in a straightline then moved right to left then descend when i lost sight. i told my mom as it happened and asked neighbors to look but by that time it dropped behind tree. i have lived by a military airport and a regionalairport i have never seen a light that color before. no tail so no meteor. it was in distance and i couldn'tmake out the shape just that it was a bright emerald green light.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Witnessed a strange emerald green light in sky in between two radio towers.

content.detailedDescription: On july 4th, 2014, at about 8:50pm, i went outside to take my dog for her nightly bike ride. i could hear fireworks going off, but couldn't see any, due to a very overcast sky. if there were a plane, i would not be able to see it. i could see nothing but the overcast sky. however, to the east, about 25 degrees from the horizon, there was a very large (about jupiter x3) red orb in the sky. it was stationary, hovering, and gently pulsating. i stared at it for a minute or two. it reminded me of the red orb we'd seen on nye at 12:05 in the southeast sky. it started to flicker out like a candle or a light bulb on its last legs. it slowly descended while it was flickering. then it finally flickered out completely. it was totally silent the whole time. i didn't feel anything out of the ordinary, but i knew that in such an overcast sky where i couldn't see fireworks, stars, or hues from the sunset, that i'd seen a ufo. especially since it was so similar to the ufo we'd seen on nye. i couldn't help but think that these ufos maybe appear more frequently when there are fireworks displays, because they know our eyes are on the sky. just my opinion based on my experiences!
content.summary: Huge red orb visible in overcast skies, flickers out then disappears

content.detailedDescription: My dad and i went out on the balcony to have a smoke and i noticed a white light off in the distance like 2 miles  in the sky to the right of us i watched it fly slow like a plane but there was no noise like a plane when it came closer as it went past the tree i ran inside got my shoes on then ran out front to look for it i walked toward the road and looked back at my building and i noticed it was flying above over my building now i watched it fly west over as it went over another apartment building another white star orb was flying towards the one i was watching fly flew at each other it looked like they were gonna crash into each other but they didn't the one i 1st saw got 10 feet away then vanished the 2nd one i seen after it passed like 10 feet after passing it it turned off its light then it looked black put both hands together infront of you and close one then open at the same time close the other and that's how it flew then turned left (north) finally going up and dissapeared
content.summary: Two lights looking like orbs flying at each other

content.detailedDescription: On january 1st, 2014, at 12:05am, in rohnert park, ca., my girlfriend and i were at home for new year's eve and decided to go outside to the back porch to listen to the fireworks and guns being fired in celebration. our deck faces southward. we both noticed a glowing, pulsating red circle/orb/sphere just above the treeline towards the southeast. it struck us both as odd because it was easily larger than any star in the sky. i would say it was jupiter x3. it made no sound. it was stationary and kind of hovering and pulsating. it had a presence that i can't really describe. we never felt scared; rather intrigued. we thought it might be some sort of "nye blimp" and went inside after a few minutes because it was cold. when i turned back before going inside, it was still there, above the treeline, pulsating and hovering. we didn't think much of it until a couple weeks had passed and we saw numerous reports of the same ufos being witnessed, at the same time, in the southern and eastern parts of the state. we knew that what we had seen that night was indeed a ufo.
content.summary: Pulsing, stationary red orb bigger than 3 jupiters just after midnight on nye

content.detailedDescription: The sky was getting very dark and stormy with lightening. i decided to take some photos because it was so dramatic.  a couple of minutes later i looked at the photos in my camera and noticed one with what looked like a spec. zooming in, it did not look like a spec but a moving vessel. the cerro (mountain) was in focus, but the thing in the sky above it was not.  that's because it must have been moving. although i was quite excited, i was not surprised because there have been reports of ufos in new mexico before.
content.summary: I was taking some photos of the very dark sky before we got the storm. and noticed this strange shape flying over the cerro.

content.detailedDescription: I went outside around midnight to take out the garbage, when i headed for the door i saw a red light in the sky just above the tree line.  at first i thought it was just an airplane(i live about 3 miles from an airport) but it didn't look right, the light was constant but would pulse extra bright once in a while. i've seen a lot of planes and i know what they look like, this was different. i ran into the house and grabbed my i-pad and snapped off some pictures of it. the light i saw with my eyes was moving slowly from east to west, then it turned north and then hooked back east. the weird part was it looked like it was dragging a tail of red light behind it and just below it. but what was even more weird was when i went inside and looked at the pictures i didn't see a red light, i saw two white lights and then in the next picture i saw three white lights in the classic triangle shape, then in another pic the top light moved out of alignment from the others. in the third pic i had zoomed in a little, and i could clearly see each of the orbs, they were more egg shaped than orbs. i noticed when i zoomed the last pic i could see the moon shining off of the tops of the objects. i felt excited and a little nervous knowing this thing was just slowly cruising around the skies of boise. i lost sight of it after it went behind some trees in the distance. anyone who knows me knows i am not an easily excited guy and not easily fooled either, i almost didn't report the incident, but felt moved to do so based on the evidence i personally saw.
content.summary: I saw a solid red light that pulsated, it made a hook path in the sky just above tree line.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting out in front of my home in a lawn chair. sitting against the house which faced south. all of a sudden two white orbs were coming at from across the street and above trees. there was no sound. i sit out looking for ufos all year around as i have seen one about 20 times in my life . first time was 1947 summer. it was shaped like saturn. 
anyway it was cold and i had to get my glove off and reach in my pocket . this object did not have far to travel before it was over my head. i would of make a video but there was no time. as i raised the camera up it was almost on top of me. i had to turn around to get it passing over the east side of my roof. what was amazing is it lit up for me right when i snapped the camera. like her you go lois. wow . i ran away from the house to look over it. it was gone in a second. like it just bleeped off. after all the night was early and we live on sort of a busy street .. one way going east. a third orb showed when it was over my head at tail. this was not moving with the normal shape being out ahead . it was like a triangle moving backward as it went north.  that is about it besides the photo i have which i will file here. 
my last file was for my granddaughter sighting at easter in 2013. at springfield. i did my first report around 2000 of an abduction and missing time. 1972, bloomington illinois. you still have it on file. i never had a camera but this time i did. i have a video of a tower ufo over my backyard in  2012 i have never filed. i will do this sometime. thank you for filing these reports. all i ever wanted was some one to believe me.  
yours truly . lois. 

one photo is zoomed in a little. the other you can see the front of my home and roof where the ufo went over.
content.summary: Three white orb coming at me in front of my house . i was sitting against the house . took photo as it went over my roof

content.detailedDescription: Hi. just wondered any reports near harrison michigan on july 5,2014. stayed at big cabin on cranberry lake 4 miles east if harrison. was 30 people stayed weekend with campers too. july 5 overheard two fishermen staying with us talking about seeing 2 strange metallic looking objects flying over lake that morning. the one guy said he called them ufos because he couldnt identify them. i asked low or high in sky. he said pretty high up. i saw soming over the cabin that morning but went behind the tree line. thought maybe a little helium balloon, a little flat on its bittom but only seen it for less than a minute. i thought it was not moving and thought not much wind up there. then looked a couple minutes later it was gone. thought maybe it had drifted behind tree line.. i dont know if that is same time as whar fisherman observed. what i observef appeared to be over cranberry lake, which is same lake fishernan were in that morning. i dont know if what the two guys watched was what i spotted ir even if it was sane time of morning. marvin the one fisherman said when they first spitted the twomettalluc objects he said what the hell is that. discussing it ended but he sure was a little excited talking about it though.
content.summary: Mettallic looking balloon type appearance

content.detailedDescription:
Coming out of a donut shop in the north beach area of san francisco my friend and i both witnessed a ufo which for the first second i thought was a plane or helicopter coming towards us but i quickly realized it was moving too fast and the lights were not from a man made object. it suddenly stopped and the lights (green and red) blinked in sequence in a linear movement suggesting to me it was a circular shaped object. it made no sound and moved in fast, and slow patterns in no particular direction as if it were purposely avoiding anyone from potentially filming it because of the irregular patterns, speed, and direction in which it moved. zig zag like then it slowly started moving in a southern direction where it shrank in size then disappeared into space. 
  i and my friend both witnessed this together and i managed to film the last few seconds of the encounter although not very well. 
  this encounter provided me with evidence of which i already believed in other life in the universe. its also making me feel special and that i must do more for mankind than what i have been. 
there are a lot of theories ive had about man, the earth, the planets, and the universe. it seems our planet is too perfectly placed in relation to the sun which gives our planet life and then the moon, also perfectly placed to balance out our tides and life on the planet. so many questions i feel i have to search for now more than ever.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Dual confirmed witnessing of a ufo in san francisco

content.detailedDescription: I was coming home from the premier of dawn of the planet of the apes inb friendswood, tx and pulled into my subdivision autumn creek. i then just happened to notice a perfect triangle above and actually only could make out 3 perfectly rounded whitish yellowish but one exact color lights in the 3 perfectly bottom part of the 3 sided aircraft from three bottom lights, that were in a triangle. they were descending towards the street. i then stopped the car 4 ft from driveway and jumped out to make sure i was really seeing a triangle object or 3 bottom triangle lights descending from what seemed like the pitch black at night around 12:45am-1:15ish am 7-11-2014. as i jumped out the car and realized this was not a ordinary aircraft with jet engines because there was no noise what so ever. i then got a little worried and jumped back in the car, turned the car in to half way into the driveway and that is when i could see a rapid, smooth, silenced, 3 sided triangle almost a perfectly 3 sided triangle but a little wider with 3 lights in each corner of triangle craft and it seemed to be 15 secs from seeing it high in the sky to a decent down towards the street lights and high trees above the autumn creek neighborhood. i then  could only say this air craft is beautiful, as i was in a daze.15 secs later i jumped out of the car as triangle shaped aircraft was descending  and still could only see the 3 lights underneath, but knew this aircraft was coming down. i then jumped out the car in the middle of my driveway as a 3 sided triangle shaped aircraft with the 3 different lights underneath coming down at me began to get larger in width but absolutely  beautiful in exact in triangle shape. i was in such a daze cause i kept saying beautiful , this is beautiful and still trying to get my phone to go to the camera. i was absolutely astonished because it was pitch black out, street lights were out or about half and i finally have my phone in the air but as im pressing the camera icon and i could not get my screen to move on bit. as the triangle shape aircraft descended to about 100ft above tree level it was huge. i still could only see the bottom of the craft until it made a perfectly beautiful left degree turn over me and the full moon just barely shined on the side of the craft to allow me to see this very unusual stealthy black but blended great with the night. i also can say it was the size of my house, the width of the triangle can guess and say 5ft-6ft give or take . i apologize but hard to guess aerodynamics flying in air at time. this large triangle shape air craft mad a left turn over me perfectly silenced in air. i saw no jet engines for a b-2 bomber, there was no engines or noise period. that is what amazed me the most. i mean this was a piece of aircraft workmanship and i have never in my 32 year life seen anything like this so outstandingly perfect flying in the air. making small adjustments in speed in small amount of time and as it turned left it was above tree level and went perfectly above and between my two neighbors house which then i was about 15ft away but could see this black triangle shape aircraft almost seem to stop on a dime in the air, perfectly silenced, no noise, but of course a whitish yellowish but one color 3 round lights in the 3 corners of the craft and it seemed to hover for a sec or two in between my 2 neighbors houses. i still was watching this craft and as it made this small seconds hover maybe 50-100ft above. all of the sudden as fast as it came it made turn hovered and then went back to same speed it came in but away from me in the pitch black and almost seemed like lights came together or just moved faster away and got smaller but was going then. it completely blended into the night and i was standing in my driveway with phone in air but could not get camera app to open for around 15-16mis and it vanished very quickly. i walked into my house and exactly 10-15mins after triangle shape aircraft vanished there was a all black black hawk helicopter on scene , and exactly in path of were aircraft was descending  before left turn. actually the black hawk helicopter flew over me and went left of me instead. i'm not sure if there was any meaning to that for this is my first time to ever witness or write about something i saw in the air, flying, and large triangle shape aircraft. i do live in houston are where we do have nasa and we have military bases. i love and respect my country fully , but this is something i decided as a man to write about because it was the most beautiful, amazing aircraft i have ever witnessed before and i hope i one day can figure out how this craft was flying with no jet engines or any kind of engined aircraft but mainly was amazed by zero sound.
content.flightPath: Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was coming home from the premire of dawn of the planet of the apes inb friendswood, tx and pulled into my subdivision autmn creek. i thenjust happened to notice a perfect triangle above that had 3 perfect round whitish yellow lights flyin,decending turn

content.detailedDescription: My mom , aunt , cousin were coming from outside and then saw a bright light in the sky . they called me downstairs and then i saw that a disc like shaped light was coming from north direction and it became as it came closer and then it stopped and move backwards and then it glowed more and moved towards the north east direction and continued to move towards that way. as we saw it moving that way i glanced at the sky once and i saw one more disc like shaped light which was glowing more then the other one and then the second one stopped in the middle of the sky and was floating in sky for a 5 to 7 mins and then the light disappeared. a video was taken but was deleted as it was a old mobile. we had some tenants who also were the witness of this event.
content.summary: Two ufo's were spotted in the sky in india,assam,guwahati

content.detailedDescription: My wife and i were sitting at our kitchen counter when a bright orange light like a sphere/orb caught our eye through the nearby patio door.We both jumped up and said what is that? i remarked that it looks like a ufo. we are in the descent path to philadelphia int. airport and we've seen many airliners on their approach. we are also in the path of helicopters from news bureaus, coast guard, and nearby mcguire afb. we both agreed that it wasn't anything like we had seen from our backyard before. as we ran outside i noted the time 9:12. the bright orange light that was like a sphere or orb, was the size of an aspirin and pulsated at a random clip. the brightness then began to diminish and it started to move. it was first spotted in the eastern sky at appx. 30 degrees above horizon. it moved slowly to the se as an airliner on a ne route passed between us and the object. they appeared to be about the same height of which i would estimate at less than 5,000 feet and the airliner was about a mile or less away. i remember thinking at the time that the sphere/orb should be visible to the passing airliner. the pulsating light then became very dim and stopped for about two seconds before reversing direction. it then brightened slightly and followed a straight line course towards where it was first spotted. about halfway to that spot the pulsating orange light just blinked off. it did not fade out but was like turning off a light. i checked the time and it was 9:16. i was glad my wife had this sighting of her first ufo. i have had multiple sightings in my life going back to 1965 and being an enthusiast since then i've been unable to share an actual sighting with her until now. i should add that due to hurricane arthur passing by earlier a high front coming down from canada caused very clear skies with a strong wind out of the nw. all local fireworks were postponed on this day, the 4th of july.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: An orange pulsating orb or sphere that moved slowly, stops for several seconds, then reverses direction before just blinking off.

content.detailedDescription: Party of 3 saw 2 reddish/orange orbs coming from the southwest sky from back patio about 9:45pm. we were sitting on back patio talking when fiance spotted the 2 orbs. i immediately knew that this was some type of ufo as we live by 2 airports and a major police agency, we see all sizes of planes and helicopters at all times of the day and night. these orbs were like nothing i have ever seen before.  they appeared out of the sky bright and clearly visible to the naked eye. the orbs hovered and changed direction frequently, one would hover above the other or move the side of the other. twice the orbs became 1 orb and then split back into 2 orbs. the sighting lasted about 20 minutes. 1 orb then got smaller until disentigrating into the sky (almost looked like traveling higher into the atmosphere and at a fast speed) until no light could be seen. the remaining orb continued to travel in an easternly direction until also disentigrating, then moving fast higher into the atmosphere until it could no longer be seen. no sound, this area is surrounded by 2 airports (chino and ontario) and near a freeway, with a lot of helicopter activity due to major police agency near by. there was no sound, my fiance and i along with my nephew were mesmerized, we could not even run into the house to get our phones to record or take a picture. there was an airplane traveling west that had to have also seen the orbs, it should have also come up on the 2 airports airspace radars.
content.summary: Orange/red orbs hovering and traveling east bound, turned into 1 orb and back into 2 orbs twice

content.detailedDescription:
Hello, first of all this is not a report of a sight, that's why my application is so vague. i'm writing this, cause i hope you to help me understand what happened, maybe you already received others reports like this one, maybe you know some explanation, but, in any case, please, let me know.
i don't remember exactly the year, month and date of the event, all that i know is it happens between 1990, 1991, in a wednesday. i know it was a wednesday, because i was coming back from the church that i used to attend the mass at wednesdays. i was between fifteen and sixteen years old, and  was with my boyfriend of nineteen years old. it was a quarter to ten pm, i remember the exact time, because i had to be home by ten o'clock, at the risk of being punished by my parents. so, disregard the month i pointed in form, because i don't remember...
it was time to back home and me and my boyfriend start the way back. i use to live in a street named prudente de moraes, and we where at the perp��tuo socorro church, so we started down the street s��o lucas, toward adhemar de barros and when we where crossing the street silviano barbosa, the most amazing thing happened.
it's difficult to explain, so let me give an example that is more familiar: the old photo labs had a dark room, usually illuminated by a red lamp. within this environment, everything is in shades of black and red, right?
well, we were crossing the street silviano, and when we were exactly in the middle of this street, everything turned to black and red, as if we were entered in a photo lab's dark room! 
in the form you ask about the lights emission, well i can't say that was a light emission. in that moment, that lasted half a second (the time it takes for blinking my eyes three or four times) i thought i'd been hit by a car, and the shades of black and red that i was seeing, would be blood in my eyes.
i mean, the shades of black and red seemed to come from within, as if somethin had affected my vision.
suddenly everything went back to normal. me and my boyfriend were still there, in the middle of the street, in a kind of a shock. i look at him and asked: did you see that? about the same time he asked me back if i had seen it too.
what we saw?
he told me he had seen it all turns red. just like me. 
what could have been? 
i remember looking for street lamps, they usually shone. i remember we considered the possibility of a lightning, but there was no thunder, there was no physical sensation, beyond the disturbance of vision. we look to the sky, but he seemed dark, starless, overshadowed by the light of the street lamps. we saw nothing else. there was no explosion of any kind, no electricity transformer was burnt, there was nobody else on that street besides us. nothing that could explain what affected our vision.
since then i have been trying to find an explanation for this event. i've talked to physicists and meteorologists, they could not explain what happened. i thought it could be an atmospheric phenomenon known as "sprite", but i was told that it only occurs at high altitudes in the atmosphere. s��o jo��o da boa vista is about 700 meters form sea level, not high enough for sprite phenomena.
well, that's all! i hope you have heard about something like that before, because i can't believe it only happened with me and my boyfriend at that time. please send me a feed back if you ever heard about something like this before, or even better, if you have any explanation. i don't know if this is related to ufo's, could it be? 
thank you for your attention, and sorry about my poor english.
hopefully
cristiane
content.summary: Everything turned red
content.locationName: São João da Boa Vista, São Paulo
